dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick glance at Elena who rolls her eyes...

dialogues.text: But that's not what brings me here today. When I heard about Principal Mosster's sex education program I thought I'd volunteer my own personal story, in hopes that you might learn from the mistakes I made. Back in High school all I wanted to do was get drunk, stoned and laid...

dialogues.text: By my junior year, my life was a blur of cheap beer, anonymous sex, partying every night of the week...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena covers her mouth, as if to cough...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through fake coughs) ...whore...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This quiets the auditorium.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Miss Richards. My name's Dr. Chad Borman. I run the forensics lab at the police department, where my work has helped convict hundreds of sex offenders. Most teens like Ms. Richards never get their lives together. The physical scars may go away, but the emotional damage stays forever.

dialogues.text: Sure. We've been having sleepovers. Talking about boys, swapping tips. She's been teaching me about shopping, I've been teaching her about giving mind blowing head...

dialogues.text: Jay's taken aback once more. How much more aback can he b He reaches out and blocks the video camera lens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme the camera back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena saunters slowly past, brushing up against him. Keep camera trained on his worried face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay's reaching his elastic limit. He reaches for the came Elena won't let go. They wrestle for control of the video And finally the camera slips from both their grasps, flie the room and SHATTERS on the concrete floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (slyly) Ooopppps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena runs her finger under Jay's chin, then turns and wa leaving Jay standing there, all taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A drunken Marie brings her BMW to a swerving halt outside construction site. She takes a swig from the Champagne bo the passenger seat for dutch courage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) It's present time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches for the car door handle, but comes up short. looks back up she's in for some taking aback of her own..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena comes walking out of the building site, and the two lock eyes. There's an uncomfortable moment before Elena f satisfied smile and walks away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's about to get out of her car when Jay comes walkin the site, looks around the lot, sees Marie's car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here at this time of night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stammers to find the words...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just...wanted to apologize for my behavior earlier. I was out of line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay's mood lightens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we admit our mistakes we grow. You've made an important step.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So...what about my present?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meet me at the Museum. Before school tomorrow. Now go home, get some sleep, I'm gonna finish up here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks away and a smile creeps across Marie's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A perfect rainbow is trapped inside the two flawless Moth Daughter DIAMONDS, glinting in the morning sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie can barely contain her excitement as she paces fran in the dark marble museum hall, reaching out a trembling towards the glass case containing the priceless jewels...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really think you're ready for your inheritance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie looks round to see Jay striding into the Museum, st the same clothes as yesterday...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was...it was what Mom wanted...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay looks at her sternly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the only one who can open that lock, but I'm the one with the key. She wanted you to have the diamonds when you were responsible enough to know what to do with them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm...responsible...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay shakes his head slowly, deliberately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? Underage drinking, prying into my personal affairs, fighting...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they're mine. Mom left them to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're yours when I say they're yours. For the time being, I've got some major problems at the construction site. Deadlines have to be met. We'll talk again when you've done some growing up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay puts an arm around his stepdaughter, starts walking h towards the massive wooden doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, don't fight me on this.   We're Team Clifford, remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (without conviction) Team Clifford...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's stuck in an awkward embrace with her Step Father...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay leads Marie down the stone steps outside the quaint M building. But as they approach his car they're hit by...B RED FLASHING LIGHTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whine of sirens has Jay spinning around in surprise, over to see four Police Cruisers come to a screeching hal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half a dozen of Blue Bay's finest, lead by the dashing yo OFFICER ENTWISTLE, draw their badges, approach Jay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Clifford?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I help you, Officer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're under arrest on suspicion of rape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay's jaw drops to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There must be some mistake, this isn't possible...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay, what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Entwistle puts a powerful hand on Jay, leads him to the f Police cruiser.      J

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call my lawyer, tell him to meet me down the station. This is outrageous...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Entwistle gets into the Police car's passenger seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't do anything, I swear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid she's got a different story.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's 'she'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena paces the sterile interview room like a caged tiger stops in front of the two way mirror, examines her reflec

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tentatively she reaches out a trembling finger touching t on her lip, covering the wound Marie inflicted at the par slowly Elena starts to press on the cut, until the blood flow once more...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a quiet knock on the door and Elena quickly lower hand, looks round...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen Richards, the young Parole Officer who so heart wrenchingly told her story at Blue Bay High earlier, come into the gray room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena just looks up at her pitifully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you tell me what happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through stifled sobs, Elena states...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was Jay Clifford. He raped me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The interview room door swings open and DETECTIVE MICHAEL MORRISON, 30's, enters. He's the personification of the t "overworked, underpaid."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You understand the seriousness of this allegation, young lady?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena nods weakly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you know that we'll leave no stone un- turned in the investigation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There'll be a battery of forensics tests you'll have to take, humiliating stuff. And background checks, digging up all kinds of dirt. And you'll have to testify in court, face the man you're accusing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crocodile tears roll down Elena's cheeks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure you want to go through with this? No harm, no foul, you can just walk away right now....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen interjects...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, Detective, this isn't the right time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ain't lying. You think I'm lying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen turns to her young ward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're telling the truth, you won't find a more sympathetic ear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'If' I'm telling the truth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if you're not, there's gonna be trouble, you understand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is already trouble. The man you're accusing happens to be a friend of mine, and when the DNA tests prove you're lying I'm gonna come down on you like a ton of bricks, mark my words...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena withers under his glare...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay huddles in the small interview room along with Marie BLOOM, his sharp suited attorney.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna sue their asses til time runs backwards...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Marie) You've gotta believe me, I would never, could never do anything like this, you know that don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie takes his hand, squeezes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're team Clifford.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay forces a tired smile...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door swings open and Morrison enters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay. Marie. Mr. Bloom...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay stands, shakes Morrison's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Marie) Would you mind waiting outside while me and your stepdad have a little chat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie looks to Jay, doesn't want to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK honey. Michael and I are old pals...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reluctantly she leaves, letting the door swing closed aft Jay sits back down. Morrison takes a chair opposite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's the divorce treating you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's taken me for everything I'm worth. I swear to God, I'm never trusting another woman as long as I live.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: heo intervenes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is most egregious, Detective, my client has pressing matters at his construction site. He can't afford to waste time with this frivolous nonsense...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jay) Look, we're taking her statement right now, gonna run every forensic test in the book. Guarantee the case'll come apart like a $2 watch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay nods, certain he can beat this rap...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She had my camcorder. Recorded what happened. It should still be at the construction site. It'll clear my name...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be outta here by tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie waits out in the anonymous hallway, talking a mile- on her cell phone...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe it, Jenny...It just doesn't make sense...I mean, I know Jay...I know he'd never...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When a door down the hall opens she looks up expectantly, see Kristen come out, walk towards her, followed by someo Marie's view is blocked by Kristen until the Parole Offic her and reveals...Elena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This can't be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A look somewhere between horror and shock is etched on Ma beautiful face. Elena just smiles, blows her a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No such word as 'can't'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police cars line the driveway outside the beach front bui site. Officers cordon off the road as Forensics teams pho every inch of the building...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing amidst the crowd of onlookers is an irate Mr. Ba accompanied, as ever, by Cicatriz. They are both on CELLP both talking angry, fast Spanish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plastic sheeting covers the windowless top floor of the u condos. The white suited FORENSICS TEAM work meticulously the tireless Dr. Chad Borman, delicately dusting anything everything that might yield evidence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison stands at the edge of an area cordoned off by PO TAPE. He's looking at Jay's smashed DIGITAL VIDEO CAMERA, bagged and tagged as evidence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sexual predators often keep a trophy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison spins, sees Kristen. He stumbles with his words, to talking to beautiful women...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he recorded the rape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison looks at the remains of the camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And maybe he didn't. We'll never know. Tape's mangled. Forensics said it'd take months to fix it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up into Kristen's hypnotic eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were never properly introduced. Michael Morrison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She offers her hand, and Morrison shakes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss Richards. Kristen. Miami Parole. Was just in town for a couple days checking in on some parolees when all this went down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands Morrison a BUSINESS CARD, which he absently stu his pocket...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think maybe you could lean on the girl? Get her to drop this nonsense? We all know she's lying. With all this Black widow shit going down, we just don't have the time or manpower to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She might not be lying, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What makes you think that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a look in her eye. I...I have some experience...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison doesn't want to push her further...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of a sudden the sunlight is blocked from the massive unfinished floor by black sheets erected by the Forensics leaving everyone in pitch darkness....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly an eerie ULTRA VIOLET GLOW fills the room. The whi forensics technicians, glowing under the black light, wai patiently for evidence to show itself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the clear IMPRINTS of hands on the wall become c along with the black stains of BLOOD FLECKS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood, fingerprints, sign of a struggle. I'd say we've got a rape on our hands, Detective, but we won't know for sure until we run the tests...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison's head is spinning...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Just do it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena sits on the edge of a gurney in the high tech foren rubbing her arm where a band-aid covers a fresh needle ma appears at the doorway and she stares daggers at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You vampires really need five pints of my blood? That's like an armful...

dialogues.text: Chad's surprised by her venom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's standard procedure in a rape test. Test for drugs and such...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And such.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She continues to pace as Chad makes his way into the room the desk and takes down a plastic beaker from the metal s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going to need a urine sample. Do you think you could fill this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad goes red. Puts the plastic cup down on the desk and grabs it.            C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If...you wouldn't mind...removing your clothes. I'll leave the room, give you some priv...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The breath catches in Chad's throat as Elena takes her sh without hesitation. Stands there in just her black bra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done. Next?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's jaw drops. Not just because Elena's in her underwe because of the clear BITE MARKS on her neck and arms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bite marks. He chowed down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're clear evidence markers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches out, grabs a Polaroid Camera from the desk, st snapping away like an ornithologist at a bird convention. FLASH of the camera fills the room...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASHBULBS explode as Marie accompanies her stepfather up steps of the austere Blue Bay courthouse, surrounded by a of sound bite hungry pressmen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any comment, Mr. Clifford?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay puts his hand up to block the intrusive lenses. He di quickly into the shelter of the courthouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Marie) Did your stepfather rape that girl? How could he do something like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stops in her tracks, wheels around and addresses th of reporters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay...is innocent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Says it like she means it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The packed courthouse is abuzz and the elderly JUDGE WILC forced to slam his gavel down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Order!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay sits at the defendant's table, suit impeccable, hair immaculate, game face on. Theo sits beside him, scribblin Marie is in the front row of the gallery, surrounded by h coiffured peers. She tries to smile stoically at Jay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen sits beside Elena at the prosecution table.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: had is on the stand as ARLO MEESE, 35, the slick District Attorney, steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Borman, do your tests show that Elena Sandoval had sexual intercourse on the night of the 25th?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes they do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do they show that it was forced?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. There was extensive bruising and tearing. We found no semen evidence. The latex abrasions point to the use of protection. This is quite common in cases of premeditated rape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what can you tell us about Miss Sandoval's toxicology reports, Doctor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Came back positive for Rohypnol, a common date rape drug. Traces were also found on the bottle of beer at the crime scene. Both Mr. Clifford and Miss Sandoval's fingerprints were all over the bottle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I took it from her. She was far too young to be drinking!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A slam of the gavel silences Jay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Borman I am going to show you what's been marked as state's exhibit number 1.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods to the bailiff and a PROJECTOR whirs to life. An PHOTO that Chad took of Elena's wounds is displayed on a beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does this slide show?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss Sandoval was found to have numerous bite marks on her upper torso that occurred during the rape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about those other markings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad looks confused, studies the slide, sees four equidis aligned in a small circle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't able to determine...Fingernail markings, possibly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Meese)                                              Please continue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie can barely breathe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to show you another slide

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: that's been marked as state's exhibit number 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meese nods to the bailiff, who dutifully changes the slid court goes dark for a second before the next slide is displayed...It's a close up of Jay's teeth mouldings comp

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the bite marks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can you tell us about these mouldings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were made from the defendant's teeth, and the tests I conducted show there's simply no other conclusion. The bite marks on Miss Sandoval's body were made by the defendant, Mr. Jay Clifford...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it. The Court erupts, flashbulbs exploding. Jay sl in his chair, his air of cool gone in an instant. He look Marie, utter disbelief on his face. The tears well in her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Judge bangs his gavel in a vain attempt to regain con

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Court's adjourned...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TV news gleefully reports Jay's trial like a sordid soap

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...in the face of damning evidence, Jay Clifford remained defiant. It's thought that his stepdaughter, Marie Clifford will testify in his defense tomorrow. And in other news, officials from the FBI gave a press conference today, commenting on their involvement in the Black widow case...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A walking suit, AGENT MILTON DAMMERS, steps up to the pod

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After numerous mistakes on behalf of the local authorities in Blue Bay, the FBI is mobilizing its task force...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Click. Morrison tosses the TV remote aside, sits down beh desk, piled high with files, mostly marked BLACK WIDOW, a reaches down to pick up Jay's broken video camera, still evidence bag...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a long shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison looks up, smiles faintly when he sees Kristen at door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a fan of 'Hey, how you doing', are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen smiles, enters Morrison's cluttered office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Used to play at being a spider when I was a kid, creeping around silently. Guess I haven't grown out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison shakes the broken camera parts in the evidence b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the only thing standing between my friend and a ten year stretch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The forensics lab will have time to look at it now...the Feds have taken over the Black widow case...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn gloryhounds. They knew I was close. They just want to come in and take all the credit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got a chance, Detective. To help your friend. Don't let this case slip away as well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison tightens his jaw, knows what he has to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Forensics lab is crammed with evidence bags and files working diligently, painstakingly scanning a stack of $10 one by one. He barely has time to look round when the doo and Detective Morrison comes in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad, I got a rush job for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad rolls his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No can do, boss. We're sifting through the Black Widow evidence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feds are movin' in. They'll be taking over by the case by the end of the week.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's dumbstruck, but dutifully takes the shattered vide

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You find anything on that tape, you let me know, OK?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you say, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And make sure you get that money back into the evidence locker.

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: nd Chad's left alone with the shattered remains of the vi camera, and a whole shit load of work ahead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The early morning sun casts a brilliant orange glow over smooth-as-glass surface of the school swimming pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie steps back up onto the high diving platform. Tries Slides the soon-to-be-diamond ring off her finger and thr tentatively into the water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes a breath and then dives, straight and true, int perfect blue water below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's lithe, taught body comes arcing through the water down to the bottom of the pool to retrieve the ring...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie surfaces, reaches out and puts the ring on the side pool, before looking up to see an old pair of sneakers, a electronic ankle bracelet locked around one leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice take off. Gotta work on the landing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's blood boils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena just reaches down and picks up Marie's unfinished r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like your bling ain't blinging...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me that back. It was my Mother's...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie climbs out of the pool, faces down with Elena...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like she got ripped off Princess, where's the rock?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie snatches the ring from Elena, slides it back on her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what this is all about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena reaches out, tries to stroke the wet hair off Marie She recoils before she'll let Elena touch her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not a dumb as you look...

dialogues.speaker: J
dialogues.text: enny, followed by the rest of the diving team, come march of the locker room and see the two arch-enemies confronti other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to her team mates) We got trouble...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena won't back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're ruining my life, and my stepfather's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It can end. Just like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She snaps her fingers and Marie's on the verge of tears..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jenny and the rest of the diving team approach, stand beh Marie, a seething mass of bikini-clad mindless hate...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As she turns and walks away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie smiles, pulls Elena close as the steam rises all ar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No bigee. You disposed of everything, right? The teeth, the video, all the research...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can't fess up. Not now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did, but...She's got a hard on for me. Wants to see me back in Juvie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie kisses her softly on the forehead. Her cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't let the big bad wolf get you. I promise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena's damp tank top clings to her perfect body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just want outta here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie brushes a strand of hair away from Elena's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be patient. I'll call the Museum Curator, have him prepare the funds to buy back the diamonds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we're outta here, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mile wide smile stretches across Marie's lips...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just sit back, relax, enjoy the trip...Don't forget to come again.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: heir trembling lips come together like wet hot magnets...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sunlight cuts through the dark blue surface, illuminating lucky ring gold ring that drifts down gently until...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie comes diving down into the crystalline water, pluck soon-to-be diamond ring from the bottom of the pool...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie surfaces at the edge of the pool. She places the ri the deck, pulls herself out of the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tries not to show surprise when she comes face to fac Kristen, who's picked up her ring, runs it around her fin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I help you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wondering if I could have a moment of your time. Ask a couple questions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie glances nervously back at the pool, where other mem the diving team go about their workout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in the middle of practice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll only take a moment, Marie. Might even help Jay. Remember your loving stepfather? You want to help him, don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen studies the ring for a moment, then ventures...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you agree to part with your diamonds?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This time Marie can't hide her shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay told me. But why? They were your inheritance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay needed help. We're a team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Team Clifford. Right. It's just...You must've been pretty unhappy when Jay didn't give you those diamonds for your birthday.

dialogues.speaker: M
dialogues.text: Marie's taking a beating, doing her best to remain standi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He said I wasn't ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're 18. That's heiress payday, no? Must've crossed your mind that Jay might never let you have them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's a bad liar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then this little scam artist saunters in and just takes them. With your help, no less.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen moves in for the kill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what I don't get is, why wouldn't Elena do what Jay asked, clear his name? After all, she'd gotten what she wanted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How should I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie watches in fascination as Kristen presses the top o ring against the back of her hand. Hard. Winces, then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, the only way I can make sense of it is if somehow getting Jay released from prison would spoil the plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands the ring back to Marie. Not so lucky anymore...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad strolls gingerly down the hallway, opens the door to forensics lab, freezing when he sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen, waiting patiently for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss...Richards. Is...Is there something I can do for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was wondering if you'd do me the favor of running a quick test.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, sure, I guess. Whatcha got for me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hands him the Blue Pill she found in Elena's trailer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could you tell me what this is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad tries to keep his cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problemo. It'll only take a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Chad goes about his work, Kristen begins nosing aro office. Chad looks over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful, I got lots of evidence here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts flipping through EVIDENCE PHOTOS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are these the evidence photos from the Elena Sandoval rape?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever find out what caused these markings?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds up the photograph of the four circular indentat Judge questioned Chad about in court...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like I told the Judge, I guess they're finger nail markings...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't look like finger nail markings to me. They look more like this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds up the back of her hand, where she'd made the indentation with Marie's ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you say these markings are the same?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: W-where did you get that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie gave it to me. But you already knew that, didn't you, Doc?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad has no answer to that. He can only blink stupidly an his silence doesn't incriminate him further. Kristen head door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling after) The pill. It's Rohypnol. Uh, Roofies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Been there. Done that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The massive front door swings open and Marie crosses the and is about to ascend the magnificent staircases when sh the clanking of glass coming from the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her heart is in her throat as she calls out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie enters the lavish kitchen, stops in her tracks when Chad standing at the full bar, mixing the strongest drink man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell, Chad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad fidgets nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That parole officer was sniffin' around today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie scoffs, steps up to the bar, gets in Chad's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you too. She's just trying to prove her worthless excuse for an existence. She doesn't have a thing on us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but she's askin' the right questions. It's only a matter of time. We gotta make our move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie shakes her head, resolute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. We stick to the plan. Give the Curator time to come up with the money...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's trembling hands pour the drink, most of the liquid it in to two MARTINI GLASSES...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta move fast, keep the heat off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't take the heat, get outta the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanna see 'em. The diamonds.   Make                    sure they're safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She downs half the drink in one giant gulp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanna see 'em. I thought we were

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: supposed to be partners here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's trembling, looking like he could lose it at any se

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna be the death of me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slugs the rest of the drink, strides away and Chad fo like a lapdog...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's been touched in Jay's office, the drops of bloo Cubans extracted from his thumb as a warning stain the wh carpet black... Marie walks over to his desk, opens a draw. Removes a met lock box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open it. I wanna see those puppies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie rolls her eyes, takes a key from a delicate chain a neck and fumbles with the lock. Finally she opens the box revealing the Mother-Daughter diamonds, resting on velvet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sparkling diamonds seem to have a calming effect on C stops shaking, his voice becoming more steady...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I called the museum. The deal's goin' down tomorrow. 8 am...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stumbles as she takes a step toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks to the empty glass in her hand, then begins to watching in horror as Chad drops the diamonds into his po

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, okay? But it's not like I had a choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie falls flat on her face, her world crashing to BLACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blinding morning sunlight climbs the horizon, the sti of the endless swampland glistening like diamonds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena sits out on her idling airboat, in the midst of the sawgrass, smoking. The peace is shattered by her ringing CELLPHONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yello...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie has the phone cradled between her shoulder and ear, her aching head, slowly getting her wits back. Nothing li old fashioned vengeful rage to combat a nasty hangover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into phone) Chad fucked us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (deadpan) I know. I was there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I mean he really fucked us. He drugged me an' took the diamonds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena stands on the edge of the airboat, fear rising in h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ell me you're kidding...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it's all a big joke...He stole the diamonds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena lets out an anguished wail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it down, my headache's bad enough as it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've gotta stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's fevered mind is racing as she glances at the wall 7:30. Finally a desperate plan scratches its way to the s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's heading to the museum, got himself an 8am meeting...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gonna sell the diamonds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if we find him first...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The deafening roar of an air boat cutting through dense s speeding across the endless swampland expanse. Elena expe maneuvers the machine, the wind racing through her hair..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's speakers blare out heavy metal as his rusty DAEWOO down the desolate swamp dirt road through the thick trees hundred feet or so, the road runs parallel with the water cuts back into the trees.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: had spots an Air Boat not more than a few hundred yards f He does a double take just as the road disappears back in trees. That wasn't...it couldn't be, could it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The winding dirt road crosses back to swampside and Chad' fears come true...Elena's racing along side of him in the fighting to keep up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull over!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The road runs parallel to the swamp again and Chad's eyes burst from their sockets as he sees the airboat now along matching his speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give us back the diamonds!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's heart stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spins round, looks straight ahead at the BMW RACING RI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FUCKING HELL!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He yanks the steering wheel hard left, swerves his car cl the dirt road and into the thick swathe of Melaluca trees BMW shoots past, missing his car by inches...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie slams on her brakes, brings her BMW to a skidding h the dirt road. She looks back over her shoulder, at the s Melaluca trees. No sign of Chad's car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena brings the airboat to rest at swamp side, leaps int reeds and clambers up to the dirt road. There's no sign o car, just a hole in the dense undergrowth where it plough through...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie comes running up to join Elena, a tire iron in hand

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sternly) We're not hurting him, Marie, got it? We just get the diamonds back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I 'm not gonna hurt him. No way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stalks down the path Chad's car took off the dirt r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena's breath catches in her throat. Marie disappears in trees and she's alone, out on the deserted swamp road...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie! Don't do this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hears a scream, a girl's scream...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena sprints into the thick of the trees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen is sitting at Detective Morrison's cluttered desk brow furrowed as she shuffles through the stack of newspa articles she pulled from Elena's wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison stands in the doorway, watching her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look like you could use a drink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen looks up from the articles, into Morrison's smili She smiles back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When this is all over, I'd like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison turns and walks right into a suit with an FBI ba identifying him as AGENT MILTON DAMMERS. The buzzcut agen BOXES at Morrison's feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More Black Widow leads. I need you to put them in the evidence locker, Morrison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not my job, Agent Dammers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie is standing in a clearing, staring at Chad's wrecke the top of a small slope, wrapped around a Melaluca tree Christmas present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her piercing screams force Elena to come running...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stops screaming, her face contorting in anger...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm pretty damn far from okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She points to the front seat of the crashed car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can barely bring herself to look inside. Marie shov the back, pushing her towards the open driver's side door gasps when she looks inside the car. Chad's not there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He bolted...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie clambers up the wreckage of the car, stands on the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: surveys the swamp all around her like the lioness she is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the diamonds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison grumbles as he scans his key card, opening the w door to the evidence locker. He picks up a box and enters Kristen, also carrying a box, a step behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate the help...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right back at ya.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison blushes as he absently adds the boxes to the gro shelves stuffed with Black Widow evidence. Kristen notice bundles of cash stored in and amongst the Black Widow evi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You could have a helluva holiday on that money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Recovered from the Black Widow's last score. If I'd gotten to the scene just five minutes earlier, I woulda gotten her as well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison shakes his head, ruefully, when a sudden sharp b has Kristen reaching into her pocket, fishing out a handh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A red flashing dot moves quickly in the middle of the map

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena runs full pelt after Marie, through dense swampland plastic ankle bracelet around her leg silently flashing r

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad! There's nowhere to run to, you little weasel!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She swings around, finally spotting a bloody hand print o the ashen tree trunks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She races off in hot pursuit. Elena's about to follow whe notices the red light flashing on her ankle bracelet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This can't be happening...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie slows, looks back to Elena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm more than five miles away from the Police station. I go beyond five miles and the alarm goes off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie snarls...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You telling me your Parole Officer knows you're out here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can barely speak...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She knows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's face is drained of color as he runs through the de swampland, hugging the priceless diamonds. Sweat cascades brow, and thick plumes of blood from wounds all over his swirl in the stagnant waters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most gruesome of all is a broken TURN SIGNAL embedded in leg. As the water gets knee-deep, the last of Chad's rese energy goes. He collapses in the stagnant marsh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not far off, GATORS circle. It's only a matter of time be notice the blood in the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small bit of solid ground gives way to swampland. Ele into the water, her Ankle Bracelet FLASHING RED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call it off, Marie. We gotta go or she'll find us here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A splashing sound from up ahead silences both girls...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hear that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound echoes off the dense trees. Marie points left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go that way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie heads off in the opposite direction. Elena hesitate to follow, but does as she's told, and goes left, soon en by canopy of trees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen blasts down the Blue Bay streets, a siren in the windshield blaring...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The handheld GPS continues to monitor Elena's exact posit the midst of the swamp...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena stumbles through the thick, stagnant water, scourin horizon for any sign of Chad...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rustling sound stops her in her tracks. Dead silence, u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie hacks her way through the overgrown foliage with th iron, like a Prada clad big-game hunter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calling out to Elena) You see him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No reply, just her own voice echoing back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rolls her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Useless bitch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen's unmarked car races across the desolate swamp ro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She checks the flashing GPS signal. Getting closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena bursts up to the surface of the bloody water, gasps breath. Looking down she sees Chad, holding on to her lik life depends on it. It does...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls her back down into the water, just as she catche glance of the circling GATORS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using her as leverage, Chad pulls himself out of the swam climbing over her writhing body to the relative safety of ground...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena coughs and splutters, floundering in the blood soak The ravenous Gators approach, sensing a feeding frenzy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move! Don't splash, they can sense you in the water, they'll rip you to pieces...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena freezes, looking round at the black eyes breaking t surface of the bloody water, gliding in for the kill...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hel..help me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches out a hand to Chad, only a few feet away...

dialogues.speaker: H
dialogues.text: e hesitates, then reaches out to her. But stops short of her trembling hand. Just balls his fist, squeezing every of blood out of the open wounds on his palm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dark blood cascades down into the water around Elena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he smiles as the Gators ease open their powerful jaws

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad's eyes roll back into his head as blood flows from h ears and mouth. He falls forward, stiff as a board, and S down into the water next to an apoplectic Elena. Behind h Marie, the BLOODY TIRE IRON in hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie reaches out a hand, pulls Elena out of the water. S collapses onto her back and sucks in the stagnant swamp a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Our diamonds are about to become dinner...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can't move, leaving Marie to wade into the swamp...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen approaches a fork in the swamp road at high speed checks the GPS scanner. It doesn't show her which way to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which way, which way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Split second decision. Left. She spins the wheel, takes t hand fork...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bad choice. Just a few meters down the right fork is an a BMW, an idle airboat, a crashed car, one dead man and two wild things...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena and Marie, soaked to the bone, drag Chad's cold, de out of the trees. Marie drops the body, heads straight fo abandoned BMW. Elena follows, stumbling through the vines clothes dripping wet, shivering more from nerves than col

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get rid of the body. And his car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't...I don't have a clue...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie spins round, a vicious look in her eyes. She holds soaked diamonds in her hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad made us an appointment to sell these. I'm gonna keep it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena looks down to her flashing ankle bracelet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's only a matter of time before my Parole Officer finds me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie turns back around, flings open the BMW door and get

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I suggest you get to work...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She fires up the powerful engine, speeds away in a cloud leaving Elena the most deeply unpleasant task of her youn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena struggles to drag Chad's bloody body back to his cr car. The tail lights flicker, throwing an ominous red glo the dense thicket of overhanging trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto) Jesus...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a Herculean effort she manages to stuff Chad's inert into the driver's seat. She stumbles back, horrified at t tableau before her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's car comes barreling into the parking lot outside Museum building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator paces back and forth, like an expectant fathe front of the empty glass case that used to house the diam Marie bursts into the Museum, and he strides up to meet h shocked when he sees Marie's covered in blood, sweat and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie? Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never better. Got the money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator nods nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I convinced the board of the extraordinary circumstances surrounding...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: he fishes in her bag for the diamonds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I received a call from your 'associate'. He said he would be handling the transaction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Change of plans. My 'associate' got tied up at work. Completely swamped...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator nods, unsure if he inquire further...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie finally pulls out two blood soaked Diamonds from he thrusts them at the Curator. He screws up his wrinkled fa afraid to touch them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down. It's just blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With trembling hands, Elena opens the trunk of Chad's cra She pulls out a plastic gas container, sloshing the fuel inside, then trailing it back across the vine covered gro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She carefully places the empty container down, standing t feet back from the wreckage, fumbling in her pocket for a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can barely control her hands, her whole body shaking fear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally she pulls out a MATCHBOOK, still sopping wet from swamp. She strikes match after match, but they won't ligh finally, one produces a tiny flame that simmers for a sec smoulders out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do this to me, please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In frustration, she runs back to Chad's car, looking desp for a lighter, climbing all the way in. Because of the sl slope it's on, the car's flimsy door slams shut behind he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena pays no heed, continues to rummage through the glov compartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta have a lighter or some...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's cut off as the WRECKED CAR'S HORN BLARES OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deafening, the sound echoes around the dense undergrowth. heart skips a beat. Chad's corpse has slumped forward aga steering wheel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She struggles with all her might to pull Chad's body back horn...

dialogues.speaker: S
dialogues.text: ilence reigns once more. Elena takes short, sharp breaths over at Chad's body slumped to the side, leaning against driver's side door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not as sorry as she's going to be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The match she discarded outside only seconds ago continue smoulder for a second, then REIGNITES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator carefully examines the diamond, turning it ov over in his hands. Marie stands over him, impatiently tap muddy shoe on the marble floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I'm not sure...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you get the cash or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator looks up to her, bemused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can get the cash...it's just...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie smiles a wicked grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then let's have those dead presidents...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The discarded match has set fire to the surrounding vines ground, and slowly the fire edges it way towards the line gasoline that Elena trailed from Chad's wrecked car...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena reaches over, carefully closes Chad's bloodshot eye Satisfied, she turns to get out, only to find the passeng door LOCKED...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tries the handle. Tries it again. Desperately yanks i opening, no sir...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena looks over, see Chad's limp elbow on the door lock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small brush fire reaches the pooled gasoline and...WH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can't help but hear the unmistakable sound of FLAME CRACKLING. Through the smashed rear window she sees the l FIRE racing towards the car she's trapped in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches over, clawing her way past Chad's corpse, try reach the door lock. Her bloody fingers slip on the lock, to pull it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE FIRE's SHOOTING towards the crashed car, only a few f away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena fumbles with the lock, tears streaming down her fac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The line of fire hits the crashed car, and ENGULFS it ins Bright ORANGE FLAMES cover the wreckage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator carefully sets down the diamonds on the marbl Marie looks at him like he's mad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One last test...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Curator hovers his heel over the biggest Diamond. Mar screams out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slams his foot down and the DIAMOND SHATTERS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena SCREAMS as the passenger side window next to her SM SPLINTERING into a million glass fragments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands reach in and grab her, pulling her through the FLAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seconds later Elena finds herself on the swamp floor, in singed arms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena can barely talk, looking back at the flaming wrecka front of her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Care to explain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was...it was an accident...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flames reflect in her tear-filled eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie stands aghast at the sight of her diamonds, in a mi tiny pieces on the museum's marble floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fakes, I'm afraid. Made of glass. Can't believe they were our top attraction all these years...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every muscle in Marie's body contracts...She stands befor empty diamond exhibit case, runs her fingers over the por her mother cradling her as a baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my inheritance is it, Mom? Goddamn Christmas ornaments...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And as the disbelief gives way to anger she rips the port the case and tears it to shreds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie, please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no stopping her now. Red-faced, she lashes out at display case with a devastating kick, the glass SHATTERIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie, stop this instant!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She continues her rampage regardless, ripping a FIRE EXTI from the wall and hurling it through another display case

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate you, Mom!    I'm glad you're dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Storm clouds gather over the whitewashed Police station..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena sits with her head in her hands, across from Kriste anonymous interview room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena looks up, tears streaking her mascara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told me what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That if you were telling the truth I'd back you all the way. If you lied to me there'd be trouble...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena slumps back down, her head on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chad swerved off the road, I swear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just swerved for no reason. Just decided to take a shortcut through the swamp?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena sobs, can't look Kristen in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was an accident...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door to the interview room swings open, and Detective strides through, a fresh-from-the-printer REPORT in his h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Accident my ass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flips the pages of the report...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forensics finds the head trauma that killed Chad Borman was inflicted by a single blow from behind.

dialogues.speaker: E
dialogues.text: lena looks up, through Panda eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crash. He...he hit his head...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that before or after you dragged him through the swamp?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena has no answers as Morrison takes the cuffs from his snaps them on Elena's wrists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the right to remain silent, which in your case is probably best, cos of the shit you come up with...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen stands up, shaking her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's two strikes, Elena. One more and you're out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena looks at her pleadingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do whatever you want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen stops. Thinks for a moment. Nods to Morrison as h Elena to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Yeah you will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll tell you the truth. I'll tell you what happened. She killed him, and took the diamonds. Marie, it was Marie Clifford...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison just sneers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep bleeting, Missy. All the way to the Judge. I think its time he heard the truth about Jay Clifford's accuser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her arrest doesn't guarantee Jay'll be cleared, you know that. You need Marie, you need the proof they set him up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison considers this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came so close to nailing the Black Widow, don't let this slip through your fingers, Detective...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's about to speak, when Elena's cell phone rings. Krist it from Elena, looks at the CALLER ID, sees Marie's name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speak of the Devil...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds the phone up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna answer it. And you're gonna say that everything went fine. No one found Chad's body. The plan's still on. Do you understand me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena nods slowly. Morrison turns to Kristen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You thinking what I'm thinking?

dialogues.speaker: K
dialogues.text: risten's patient with him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your chance. Feds can't take this one from you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison weighs his options, then finally nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen clicks the phone ON, holds it to Elena's ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yello...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie speeds wildly down the deserted Blue Bay streets, o trembling hand holding a cigarette, the other her cellpho

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The diamonds are fakes. Totally worthless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. That can't be true!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Believe it. I'm leaving. Tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't...what about...me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie takes a long drag from her cigarette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you understand? There's no money. Nothing. Zip. Zilch. Zero. How am I supposed to take care of your broke ass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen is listening in on the whole conversation. She cu hand over the phone, whispers to Elena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell her she has to meet you. Tell her she can't leave...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena nods and Kristen puts the phone back to her lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I gotta see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll send you a photo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. Just one last time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gone, gone, gonski.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena's reeling. Kristen motions for her to continue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think maybe...maybe there's a way we could still get some money...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence on the end of the line...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie considers this for a long moment.    Finally...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, talk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not over the phone. We gotta meet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: School swimming pool. One hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Click. She's hung up. Kristen nods to Morrison...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you keep the wire taps?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evidence locker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme the key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tosses her his electronic keycard...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Blue Bay High pool is illuminated in the dead of nigh casting blue ripples over the bleachers where Elena waits nervously. She can't help but fiddle with the wire hidden her shirt...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Can you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison listens nervously to Elena's tinny voice coming through the speaker...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this thing working?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Detective shoots Kristen a concerned look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's gonna blow it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena adjusts the mic taped to her chest, wincing as the pulls her delicate skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I..don't think I can do this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's already done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena looks up guiltily. Marie is standing by the side of pool. How much did she see?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The word's stick in Elena's throat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had no choice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blah, blah, blah. Get over it. He's dead. Now you told me you had a plan. Spit it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay's got cash. At the building site. I saw it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie rolls her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's your brilliant plan? It's in a safe, dumb ass. You a safecracker? Have you got magic fingers, gonna pick that lock? I don't think so. Next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kristen winces as she listens to the girls' conversation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (through the speakers) We're gonna go to Jay. Tell him what we did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like hell we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena walks down the bleachers, approaching a skeptical M

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me. We go to the jail, tell him we'll come clean, tell the police everything, if he gives us the combination. I'm still a minor, they'll send me back to Juvie. Shit, I could do that time standing on my head...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's wavering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena reaches Marie, puts her hands on her hips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enough for you and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grinds against her. Slowly, sensually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have to tell the cops anything. We'll let Jay's videotape do the talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, we got rid of the real one...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I kept a copy. Never trusted you backstabbers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena tries to pull away, but Marie drags her back until faces are inches apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're trembling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no denying it. Marie slowly draws her hand down E face, down her neck, to her chest. So close to the wire. places her palm over Elena's heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ssshhhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morrison and Kristen listen intently in their headphones, to breath...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elena and Marie stand there for what seems like an eterni unblinking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally Marie smiles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Let's do it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay laughs, as he sits across from Marie and Elena, separ an inch of bullet proof glass. Theo stands by the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, well, well. Who'd have thought. What a pleasant surprise. I guess you guys have kissed and made up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very funny. Did you know the diamonds were fakes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay nods slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your Mom hocked them years ago. Boozed it all away. You already know the end of her sorry story...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's jaw tightens. Jay leans back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, to what do I owe the pleasure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We want money. Whatever you've got in your safe at the beach condos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay bursts out laughing again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you do. Of course you do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get you out of here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay stops laughing, leans back in to the inch thick glass

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie holds up a DIGITAL VIDEO TAPE...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what I think it is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You give us the combination and this goes in the nearest mail box, tied with a pretty pink bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do I know it's the real tape?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna have to trust us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been down that road before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie opens the cassette housing, ready to rip the tape a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is non-negotiable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Theo interjects...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, we have no grounds for appeal. This could be our only chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the combination?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tortured screams of inmates echo in Jay's ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No such word as 'can't'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PRISON GUARD puts a massive hand on Jay's shoulder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time's up, Mr. Clifford.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay sighs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Marie) Fine. 08-20-99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The combination's the day Mom died, you sick fuck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay's led away in shackles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie's BMW flies down the deserted Blue Bay streets, bla through red lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie handles the car like a Formula One driver, and with the intensity. The G-force pins Elena back against the se

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie steps on the gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in a world of shit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie steps on the gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll never get away with this. You know that don't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marie steps on the gas. She ain't saying a word, and time running out for Elena...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
